alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or 10 miles northwest of The Redland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, The Hammocks, Miccosukee Resort, Country Walk and Kendall West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
